text: Rafael Bernardo López Aliaga Cazorla (born 11 February 1961) is a Peruvian businessman and politician who has been the Mayor of Lima since 2023. A conservative figure in Peruvian politics, he ran for President of Peru under Popular Renewal at the 2021 general election in which he placed third. Previously, he served as General Secretary and subsequently President of National Solidarity until the party was dissolved in October 2020 and succeeded by Popular Renewal, which he currently leads. In 2022, López Aliaga was narrowly elected mayor of Lima, the country's capital. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lima Category:Mayors
title: Rafael López Aliaga
